item.description:
This will be our second 8th Congressional District Strategy Meeting for the April 5 Republican Caucus
(Boston, Cambridge, Somerville, Brighton, Medford, etc. this means YOU)
MIT Stata Center
460 Main St
Cambridge, MA 02142
7:30 PM
Call (617) 378- 5431 with questions.

If you are interested in being a candidate for delegate to the National Convention please attend this meeting! We will decide on the 6 individuals to support for candidates at the April 5 caucus in the 8th district.

Park in this parking lot (free at 7:30 PM):
Location: http://maps.google.co...

Follow the Ron Paul yard signs to the large oddly shaped colorful building seen here:

http://en.wikipedia.o...

Our tentative meeting location will be room 32-144. If we can't meet there, look for a note on the door to redirect you.

Also this is easily accessible from the T. Take the red line to Kendall/MIT, and from there walk northwest along Main St. toward MIT (away from the Longfellow Bridge). You will see the Stata Center on the left after walking 2 blocks.
item.name: Our 2nd April 5 Caucus 8th District Planning Meeting
